original_text: And David remained in the strongholds in the wilderness, in the hill country of the wilderness of Ziph. And Saul sought him every day, but God did not give him into his hand.
korean_text: 다윗이 광야의 요새에도 있었고 또 십 광야 산골에도 머물렀으므로 사울이 매일 찾되 하나님이 그를 그의 손에 넘기지 아니하시니라

sentences.original_text: And David remained in the strongholds in the wilderness
in the hill country of the wilderness of Ziph
And Saul sought him every day
but God did not give him into his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 그를 그의 손에 넘기지 않으셨습니다
